job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAre you someone who wants to push the envelope on what is possible Do you wake up every morning trying to find a better way to deliver results beyond what others think can be done Are you constantly challenging process or procedures trying to find a better way If so we want to talk to youltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAt LoadSpring we inspire people through technology to provide amazing solutions for both our customers and ourselves We are never content with the way things have always been done and constantly challenge ourselves to ask why are we doing things this way there has to be a better solutionampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a Software Engineer who wants to excel in their career be inspired by working in a constantly evolving environment and are as obsessed as we are with getting it right for the customer If youre energetic innovative and love technology especially the cloud then you should consider joining our teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3  7 years of fullstack developer experience with experience in backend front end and database designampnbspltligtltligt2  4 years of experience with C Javascript NET ampamp MVCltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWorldClass BenefitsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are proud of our highenergy and allaround fun working environment Our team loves to come to work loves to learn and loves to winltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe offer the following perks to keep you happy healthy and engaged at workltpgtltulgtltligtInvestment in your cultural development by paying for you to take vacations abroadltligtltligtAn entrepreneurial culture where employees are empowered leadership is open and your ideas are executedltligtltligtA spot where executives are your partners who encourage innovation and your growthltligtltligtAn entire company passionate about our cloud technology and topnotch customer serviceltligtltligtA place where collaboration is highly valuable and all our employees feel like they sit in the officeltligtltligtAs well as the usual benefits Health Dental Vision Life 401k with a match Tuition Reimbursement and moreampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtLoadSpring is committing to helping the planet by reducing carbon emissions one employee household at a time Starting in 2022 LoadSpring employees are incentivized to act on ways they can reduce their carbon footprint This can be by replacing energyhogging refrigerators or something as simple as switching to LED lightsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe employee with the largest reduction will be the proud owner of a brandnew Model 3 Tesla to help continue their new sustainable lifestyleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtEEOltstronggtltpgtltpgtLoadSpring Solutions Inc is an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability or protected Veteran statusltpgtltpgtUS Citizenship or Lawful Permanent Residence status may be required for certain positions For positions requiring US Citizenship or Lawful Permanent Resident status verification of such status will be required upon accepting employmentltpgt
